content: attach rainbow yarn three rounds from tail on dorsal side single_crochet in last three rounds on one side of tail then first three of ventral side chain 4 skip one single_crochet and treble_crochet in next chain 4 fasten_off leaving a little yarn flopping loose attach yarn on 1st single_crochet on dorsal side and repeat tail on this christmas dear nora my wish was to give you a handmade yarn fish but no pattern for cod pollock haddock or scrod could i find to crochet oh posh - pish creativecommons-attribution-noncommercial-noderivitaves-4 0 lise mendel
